channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- openshift/mysql-apb
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- openshift/mysql-apb

item.title: CVE-2020-1708|2024-08-04T06:46:30.230Z -- red%20hat -- openshift%2Fmysql-apb
item.description: It has been found in openshift-enterprise version 3.11 and all openshift-enterprise versions from 4.1 to, including 4.3, that multiple containers modify the permissions of /etc/passwd to make them modifiable by users other than root. An attacker with access to the running container can exploit this to modify /etc/passwd to add a user and escalate their privileges. This CVE is specific to the openshift/mysql-apb.
